title: Play School. Special; Concert
brief_description: Appearing in the “Play school special” are eight well-loved Play school presenters: Benita Collings, Merridy Eastman, John Hamblin, Noni Hazelhurst, Jennifer Ludlum, Philip Quast, Don Spencer and John Waters. Favourite songs include ‘Old Macdonald’, ‘Baa baa black sheep’, ‘The paper song’, ‘There’s a bear in there’ and many more. Some of the stories are ‘Harry the dirty dog’, ‘There was a princess’ and ‘The hole’. Benita Collings and John Hamblin perform in a Play School concert. The audience joins in with the words and actions of popular Play school songs. Among them are ‘I’m a little teapot’ and ‘Bananas in pyjamas’.
